info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued November 15 at 3:43PM PST until November 15 at 5:15PM PST by NWS Hanford CA
info.description:
FFWHNX
The National Weather Service in Hanford has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... The Borel burn scar in... North Central Kern County in central California...
* Until 515 PM PST.
* At 343 PM PST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain over the Borel Burn Scar. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Borel Burn Scar.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Borel Burn Scar.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Bodfish.
info.instruction:
This is a life threatening situation. Heavy rainfall will cause extensive and severe flash flooding of creeks...streams...and ditches in the Borel Burn Scar. Severe debris flows can also be anticipated across roads. Roads and driveways may be washed away in places. If you encounter flood waters...climb to safety.
Move away from recently burned areas. Life-threatening flooding of creeks, roads and normally dry arroyos is likely. The heavy rains will likely trigger rockslides, mudslides and debris flows in steep terrain, especially in and around these areas.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 5:15 PM PST. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 5:15 PM PST. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 5:15 PM PST. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 5:15 PM PST. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
